about_the_game:
Anxious Puppy is an interactive narrative game where you play as a worker struggling to keep up with the pressures of life and work in a big city. One ordinary evening, you unexpectedly embark on a soul-searching journey to reconcile with your anxiety.

Through clicking and dragging interactions, you’ll experience the protagonist’s daily life, engage in conversations with everything around her, and dive into her inner world. Your task is to find traces of the anxious puppy and give it a hug.

Game Features:

  • Fresh Hand-drawn Style – A beautiful, healing, original illustrated storybook art style.

  • Unique Game Theme – The game focuses on anxiety and aims to raise players’ awareness of this emotion.

  • Warm and Healing Story – The protagonist will undergo self-exploration through dialogue and interaction, ultimately finding reconciliation with herself.

Her story is not a lonely one.

She could be you, or me, or anyone struggling with anxiety.

But in reality, anxiety is not our enemy.

It is more like a well-meaning but awkward friend, and we just haven’t learned how to get along with it yet.

This time, let anxiety transform into a little puppy, guiding you on a healing journey of self-reconciliation.

We hope that the next time you feel anxious, you will no longer criticize your emotions or yourself.

Because anxiety is not a monster; it’s just a little puppy easily unsettled.

If you're looking forward to meeting the little puppy, add it to your Wishlist!

short_description: Anxiety Puppy is a 2D interactive narrative game that focuses on anxiety. In the game, anxiety is personified as a little puppy. Players will explore its story and try to coexist with it. Go find its traces and give it a hug.
